```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message=FALSE)
```

``` {r open_libraries}
library(openxlsx)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r joining, results='asis'}

# Read CSV files
data1 <- read.xlsx("data/QMB3250_1_2014-01-13_2014-01-19.xlsx")
data2 <- read.xlsx("data/QMB3250_1_2014-01-20_2014-01-26.xlsx")

# Join data
total <- full_join(data1, data1, by=c("USER_NAME","UFID", "Section_No"), suffix = c(".Week1",".Week2"))

# Write joined data
write.xlsx(total, file="output/output.xlsx", sheetName="Joined forms")

cat("#### - The output has been generated")
```
